Return of write to annotation database

return_or_write_to_annotation_db.Rd

Return of write to annotation database

Usage

return_or_write_to_annotation_db(x, x_annotated, annotation_db, id_cols)

Arguments

x

The input tbl to the _annotate function

x_annotated

The out of the _annotate function

annotation_db

A tbl database source

id_cols

A character vector of the columns to retain in the annotations database (to enable linking)
